note:
"Not all who wander are lost." - J.R.R. Tolkien
I'm an expert in nothing but loving life.
Love furiously. That's an order. Or not. It's your call really. godspeed to us all.

Side note: Grateful for interactions, no matter how big or small. However, I block those who ignore my requests to disengage. "Rock on and be excellent to each other!" - Wyld Stallions; Bill&Ted

Neurodivergent and I'm always trying to grow. I often rely on quotes, lyrics and colloquialisms to communicate.
